Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Authorizes city board councils, city-wide councils, community councils and school based management teams to conduct meetings via videoconferencing
Summary: Authorizes city boards, city-wide councils, community councils and school based management teams to conduct meetings via videoconferencing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to meetings of the city board, city-wide councils, community councils and school based management teams
